price: 120. Hadday idin haleesho samo, waa ay murugo gelisaa (munaafiqiinta), hadday idinku dhacdona xumaani way ku farxaan. Haddiise aad samir yeelataan oo aad iska jirtaan (dhagartooda, Allena u hoggaansan tihiin, iskana ilaalisaan xumaha), tabtooda wax dhib ah haba yaraatee idiin ma geysan doonto. hubaal Alle wuu koobaa waxay fali.
arabic: إِن تَمۡسَسۡكُمۡ حَسَنَةٞ تَسُؤۡهُمۡ وَإِن تُصِبۡكُمۡ سَيِّئَةٞ يَفۡرَحُواْ بِهَاۖ وَإِن تَصۡبِرُواْ وَتَتَّقُواْ لَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in tamsaskum ḥasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tuṣib'kum sayyi-atun yafraḥū bihā wa-in taṣbirū watattaqū lā yaḍurrukum kayduhum shayan inna al-laha bimā yaʿmalūna muḥīṭun
